attributes.action: introduce a certificate which shows wheter goods come from countries which reach certain standards.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Goods come from abroad should be given a certificate if they come from countries which have similar health and safety standards to the UK. Such a a cetificate could also take into account issues such as a country's environmental standards. This would not be a ban on countries which do not reach these standards but it would allow the consumer to indirectly encourage countries to raise standards to achieve the certificate and be seen as higher quality.
